amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds for medical treatment (other than mental health treatment) related to gender transition to a person entitled to medical care under chapter 55 of title 10, United States Code.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 115-217 to prohibit funds for medical treatment (other than mental health treatment) related to gender transition to a person entitled to medical care under chapter 55 of title 10, U.S. code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hartzler amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 214 (Roll no. 369).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hartzler amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 214 (Roll no. 369).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mrs. Hartzler.
